get.summary: Returns a JSON Object containing the growth trend of outlets.

parameters.name: criteria
parameters.description: filter to group the growth (yearly, monthly or weekly)

parameters.name: month
parameters.description: month of the year to be filtered by and is required if criteria is MONTHLY OR WEEKLY

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: year to be filtered by and is required if criteria is YEARLY, MONTHLY OR WEEKLY

400.description: Cannot take action on document that does not exist!.

parentLocation.name: parentlocationid
parentLocation.description: id of parent location to filter by

locationType.name: locationtypesid
locationType.description: id of location type to filter by

location.name: location
location.description: id of location to filter by

outletType.name: outletType
outletType.description: id of outletType to filter by

outletChannel.name: outletChannel
outletChannel.description: id of outletChannel to filter by

user.name: user
user.description: id of user to filter by

distributor.name: distributor
distributor.description: id of distributor to filter by

salesTeam.name: salesTeam
salesTeam.description: id of salesteam to filter by

products.name: products
products.description: id of product to filter by

date.name: date
date.description: date range to filter by expected in fomart "YYYY-MM-DD,YYYY-MM-DD" with the start date on the left and the end date on the right

fmpcompanyid.description: id of company that this product category belongs to

parentcategoryid.description: id of the parent category that this product category falls under or belongs to; the value of 0 (zero) in this field, means that the product category has no parent
id of product category that this product brand belongs to

fmpcompanyid.description: id of company that this product brand belongs to

parentcategoryid.description: id of the product category that this product brand falls under or belongs to

fmpcompanyid.description: id of company that this note category belongs to
id of company that this payment type belongs to
id of company that this brand element belongs to

percentage.description: percentage of visit exceptions relative to total completed visits

outletName.description: name of outlet the schedule is attached to

locationName.description: name of the location the scheduled outlet belongs to

userId.description: id of user that the schedule was created for

firstName.description: first name of user that the schedule was created for

lastName.description: last name of user that the schedule was created for

dateVisited.description: date a visit was made for the schedule

startTime.description: start time of visit attached to the schedule

stopTime.description: stop time of visit attached to the schedule

durationInSeconds.description: duration of visit attached to the schedule

outletId.description: id of outlet attached to the visit

outletName.description: name of outlet attached to the visit
name of outlet attached to the visit

activeFieldReps.description: total number of actvie field reps

outletName.description: name of outlet attached to the visit

percentage.description: percentage of productive visits relative to total visits
percentage of non productive visits relative to total visits

outletName.description: name of outlet attached to the visit
